text:
RainforestQA - San Francisco, CA (or REMOTE) - Full Time engineer

We are building a better way to test software. We are well funded, have rapidly growing revenue and paying customer list, and we have nontrivial technical challenges to overcome.

We're a small team of 4 looking for two more founding engineers.

Learn more here: https://jobs.lever.co/rainforest/72beda5c-d340-41aa-97a3-2f0...
